div.p: The EMBRIC configurator data management service [10.7490/f1000research.1116538.1] was used for advice on data coordination and standards. The transcriptome data are available from the European Nucleotide Archive with the ENA accession number: PRJEB27537. The biofilm data are also available from the European Nucleotide Archive with the ENA accession number: PRJEB30562. The source data underlying Figs. 1, 2, and 3a are provided as a Source Data file. The data underlying Fig. 2 are also available from the UK Polar Data Centre, Natural Environment Research Council, UK Research & Innovation: 10.5285/93eaaf9e-0624-441b-81f0-0438b844f6bb.
